languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, а потом, не выдержав, бросает на вас еще один взгляд, полный смятения.{/n} "Хотя... это может подождать. Я... хотел бы... я навещу вас после брифинга лично. У меня... есть вопросы".

{n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, а потом, не выдержав, бросает на вас еще один взгляд, полный смятения.{/n} "Хотя... это может подождать. Я... хотел бы... я навещу вас после брифинга лично. У меня... есть вопросы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then can't stop himself from casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to— I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默片刻，随后又忍不住偷偷看了你一眼。{/n}“不过……这件事情可以先放一下放。我……我希望……我想等简报会议结束之后和你私下里见一面。我……我有问题想问。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默片刻，随后又忍不住偷偷看了你一眼。{/n}“不过……这件事情可以先放一下放。我……我希望……我想等简报会议结束之后和你私下里见一面。我……我有问题想问。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verstummt, kann dann jedoch nicht anders, als dich erneut bestürzt anzusehen.{/n} "Wobei ... das kann warten. Ich ... würde gerne ... Ich komme nach dem Briefing zu Euch. Ich habe ... Fragen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verstummt, kann dann jedoch nicht anders, als dich erneut bestürzt anzusehen.{/n} "Wobei ... das kann warten. Ich ... würde gerne ... Ich komme nach dem Briefing zu Euch. Ich habe ... Fragen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix calla, pero no puede evitar lanzarte otra mirada de consternación.{/n} «Aunque... puede esperar. Yo... me gustaría... le visitaré personalmente tras la reunión. Tengo algunas... preguntas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix calla, pero no puede evitar lanzarte otra mirada de consternación.{/n} «Aunque... puede esperar. Yo... me gustaría... le visitaré personalmente tras la reunión. Tengo algunas... preguntas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tait, mais ne peut s'empêcher de vous lancer un nouveau regard dépité.{/n} « Enfin... cela peut attendre. J'aimerais... Je viendrai vous voir en personne après la réunion. J'ai... des questions à vous poser. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tait, mais ne peut s'empêcher de vous lancer un nouveau regard dépité.{/n} « Enfin... cela peut attendre. J'aimerais... Je viendrai vous voir en personne après la réunion. J'ai... des questions à vous poser. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは黙ってしまったが、その後、愕然とした視線をあなたに向けずにはいられなかった。{/n}「だが…それは後でもいい。私は…ぜひとも…ブリーフィングの後、あなたのところへ行こう。質問がある」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは黙ってしまったが、その後、愕然とした視線をあなたに向けずにはいられなかった。{/n}「だが…それは後でもいい。私は…ぜひとも…ブリーフィングの後、あなたのところへ行こう。質問がある」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sussa da sana endişeli bir bakış daha atmadan duramıyor.{/n} "Bekleyebilir tabii ama... Ben... Rapor bildirildikten sonra seni ziyaret edeceğim. Birtakım... Sorularım var."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix falls silent, but then cannot help casting another dismayed glance at you.{/n} "Although... it can wait. I... would like to... I'll visit you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix susuyor ama sana endişeli bir bakış daha atmadan duramıyor.{/n} "Bekleyebilir tabii ama... Ben... Toplantıdan sonra seni ziyaret edeceğim. Bazı... Sorularım var."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
